title: kemally
author: kemally
content: Virtual credit card VCC work on Paypal , Wise Verification and any Website except (adult and gambling websites)  The card has to be used within 5 daysAfter Purchase you will receive : Card Number :Exp date (month/ Year)CVV/CVC Code NumberYou can use your full name as the Card HolderAll card are legit from my personal account (One Time Password "OTP" is provided instantly)Payment Accepted:BTC / USDT / any crypto on Binance. WisePrice :Wise card $26 USD (Wise requires 20 euro deposit to verify your account , Which you can withdraw instantly)  PayPal: $6   *** First 20 orders $2 USDT only for Paypal (Only one card per member) ****OTP will be sent to you instantly please notify me before using the card.How to verify Wise accounthow to verify Paypal
